uniol.apt.adt.ts

Class TransitionSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.adt.extension.Extensible
      • uniol.apt.adt.AbstractGraph<TransitionSystem,Arc,State>
        • uniol.apt.adt.ts.TransitionSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExtensible, IGraph<TransitionSystem,Arc,State>

    public class TransitionSystem
extends AbstractGraph<TransitionSystem,Arc,State>
implements IGraph<TransitionSystem,Arc,State>
    Represents a Transitionsystem. With states, arcs and an alphabet.
    Author:
    Dennis-Michael Borde, Manuel Gieseking

      Returns true if this TS contains a state with the given id.

      Creates an arc with the same source node, target node and label as the given arc and copies the extensions from the arc marked as to copy to the new arc.

      • setInitialState

        public void setInitialState(State state)
        Sets the initial state of the TransitionSystem.
        Parameters:
        state - the state which should get inital.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on passing an empty state.
        NoSuchNodeException - thrown if the state does not exist in this TransitionSystem.

      • setInitialState

        public void setInitialState(java.lang.String id)
        Sets the initial state of the TransitionSystem.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the state which should get initial.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on passing an empty id.
        NoSuchNodeException - if the state with the id does not exist in this TransitionSystem.

        Returns the initial state of this TransitionSystem.
        Returns:
        the initial state.
        Throws:
        StructureException - if the initial state is not set.

      • getEvent

        public Event getEvent(java.lang.String label)
        Get the Event instance that corresponds to the given label.
        Parameters:
        label - The label whose event should be looked up
        Returns:
        The event instance
        Throws:
        NoSuchEventException - If no event with the given label exists.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the given label is null.

      • createArc

        public Arc createArc(java.lang.String sourceId,
                     java.lang.String targetId,
                     java.lang.String label)
        Creates an arc with an id for the source node, an id for the target node and a label.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - the id of the source state.
        targetId - the id of the target state.
        label - the label this arc will receive.
        Returns:
        the created arc.
        Throws:
        ArcExistsException - if a arc with this sourceId, targetId and label already exists in this TransitionSystem.
        NoSuchNodeException - if one of the nodes does not exist in this TransitionSystem.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - upon passing a null element.

      • createArc

        public Arc createArc(State source,
                     State target,
                     java.lang.String label)
        Creates an arc from one state (source) to another state (target) with the label.
        Parameters:
        source - the source state.
        target - the target state.
        label - the label this arc will receive.
        Returns:
        the created arc.
        Throws:
        ArcExistsException - if a arc with this source, target and label already exists in this TransitionSystem.
        NoSuchNodeException - if one of the nodes does not exist in this TransitionSystem.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - upon passing a null element.

      • createArc

        public Arc createArc(Arc arc)
        Creates an arc with the same source node, target node and label as the given arc and copies the extensions from the arc marked as to copy to the new arc.
        Parameters:
        arc - the arc to copy.
        Returns:
        the created arc.
        Throws:
        ArcExistsException - if a arc with the same source node, target node and label as the given arc already exists in this TransitionSystem.
        NoSuchNodeException - if one of the nodes (target node or source node of the given arc) does not exist.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - upon passing a null element.

      • createState

        public State createState(java.lang.String id)
        Creates a new state with the given id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the state.
        Returns:
        the created state.
        Throws:
        NodeExistsException - if the state with this id already exists in this TransitionSystem.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - upon passing a null element.

      • createState

        public State createState()
        Creates a new state with an auto-generated id. The id has the form sx with x the next free integer id in this TransitionSystem. For example s0, s1, etc..
        Returns:
        the newly created state.

      • createState

        public State createState(State state)
        Creates a new state in this TransitionSystem by copying the id from another state and copying the extensions from the state marked as to copy to the new state.
        Parameters:
        state - the state to get the id and extensions.
        Returns:
        the newly created state.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed state is null.
        NodeExistsException - if the given state in this TransitionSystem already exists.

      • createStates

        public State[] createStates(State... stateList)
        Creates a few new states in this TransitionSystem by copying the id from the given states and copying the extensions from the states marked as to copy to the new state.
        Parameters:
        stateList - a list of states to get the id and extensions of those states.
        Returns:
        a list of the newly created states.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed array of states is null.
        NodeExistsException - if one state of the given list in this TransitionSystem already exists.

      • createStates

        public State[] createStates(java.lang.String... idList)
        Creates a few new states in this TransitionSystem by the given ids.
        Parameters:
        idList - a list of ids
        Returns:
        a list of the newly created states.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed array of ids is null.
        NodeExistsException - if one id of the list in this TransitionSystem already exists.

      • createStates

        public State[] createStates(int count)
        Creates #count new states in this TransitionSystem with a auto generated ids.
        Parameters:
        count - how many states should be created.
        Returns:
        a list of the newly created states.

      • removeArc

        public void removeArc(java.lang.String sourceId,
                      java.lang.String targetId,
                      java.lang.String label)
        Removes the arc with the sourceId, targetI and label from this TransitionSystem if exists. It also updates the alphabet, if the removing arc was the only arc with this label.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - the source state id.
        targetId - the target state id.
        label - the label of the arc which want to be removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on passing null to any argument.
        NoSuchNodeException - if the node does not exist in this TransitionSystem.
        NoSuchEdgeException - if there is no arc with given sourceId, targetId and label in this TransitionSystem.

      • removeArc

        public void removeArc(Arc a)
        Removes the given arc from this TransitionSystem by searching an arc with the same source, target and label as the given arc. It also updates the alphabet, if the removing arc was the only arc with it's label.
        Parameters:
        a - the arc which want to be removed.
        Throws:
        StructureException - if the arc does not belong to the TransitionSystem. That mean it was not created by this TransitionSystem.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on passing null to any argument.
        NoSuchNodeException - if the node does not exist in this TransitionSystem.
        NoSuchEdgeException - if there is no arc such as the given arc in this TransitionSystem.

      • removeState

        public void removeState(java.lang.String id)
        Removes the state with the id from the TransitionSystem. It also sets the initial state of this TransitionSystem to null if the state belonging to this id has been the initial state of this TransitionSystem.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the state which should be removed.
        Throws:
        NoSuchNodeException - if there is no state with the given id in this TransitionSystem.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on passing null to any argument.

      • removeState

        public void removeState(State state)
        Removes the given state from the TransitionSystem by searching a node with the same id as the given state.
        Parameters:
        state - the state to remove.
        Throws:
        StructureException - if the state does not belong to the TransitionSystem. That mean was not created by this TransitionSystem.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on passing null to any argument.
        NoSuchNodeException - if the state is not in this TransitionSystem.

      • getArc

        public Arc getArc(java.lang.String sourceId,
                  java.lang.String targetId,
                  java.lang.String label)
        Gets the arc with the sourceId, targetId and label from this TransitionSystem.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - the source state id of this arc.
        targetId - the target state id of this arc.
        label - the label of the arc.
        Returns:
        the arc.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on passing null to any argument.
        NoSuchNodeException - if some of the nodes given by there id's does not exist in this TransitionSystem.
        NoSuchEdgeException - if the arc given by the id's of source an target node and the label does not exist in this TransitionSystem.

      • getArc

        public Arc getArc(State source,
                  State target,
                  java.lang.String label)
        Gets the arc with the source, target and label from this TransitionSystem.
        Parameters:
        source - the source state of the arc.
        target - the target state of the arc.
        label - the label of the arc.
        Returns:
        the arc.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on passing null to any argument.
        NoSuchNodeException - if the node does not exist.
        NoSuchEdgeException - if the arc given by the id's of source an target node and the label does not exist in this TransitionSystem.
        StructureException - if the state source or target don't belong to this TransitionSystem. That mean has not been created by this TransitionSystem.

        Parameters:

        label - the label to look for
        Returns:
